description: A 55-year-old man is in a critical condition after being hit by a Volvo lorry in Edinburgh on Sunday.
title: HGV lorry failed to stop after hitting Edinburgh pedestrian
title_page: HGV lorry failed to stop after hitting Edinburgh pedestrian - BBC News
maintext:
A pedestrian is in a critical condition in hospital after he was hit by a lorry which then failed to stop on an Edinburgh road.
The 55-year-old was knocked down by a Volvo lorry on the A701, Craigmillar Park, near the junction with Lygon Road at about 18:15 on Sunday.
The HGV did not stop at the scene but was later traced along with the 37-year-old male driver.
The man is being treated in the Royal Infirmary of Edinburgh. Police are appealing for witnesses.
